item.title: 'OITNB' season 4 sneak peek
item.description: Litchfield Penitentiary is getting some new blood, and spilling some of it too.
item.ExtractedText:
Facebook Twitter Instagram
'Orange Is the New Black' season 4 sneak peek Updated 2045 GMT (0445 HKT) May 10, 2016 Season 4 of "Orange Is the New Black" starts June 17. Story highlights New season looks to be dark Series returns on June 17 (CNN) Litchfield Penitentiary is getting some new blood, and spilling some of it too. The trailer for season 4 of Netflix's hit "Orange Is the New Black" is pretty menacing to say the least. Red is losing it, Crazy Eyes looks to be injured at some point and Piper better watch her back. There are 100 new inmates and a rash of new guards as well. Oh and a SWAT team swarms. "You know the difference between pain and suffering," Tiffany (actress Taryn Manning) asks. "Pain is always there. But suffering is a choice." Read More
